title: Alawar Games - Holly A Christmas Tale Deluxe FINAL - New Hidden
description:
Holly. A Christmas Tale Deluxe FINAL


Prepare for a journey of wonder in a new version of a holiday classic! Holly: A Christmas Tale Deluxe tells the story of a young woman who nods off on Christmas Eve and dreams about helping Santa deliver toys to children around the world. But is she really asleep? And what about the magic wand she&#039;s using? Does it hint at a greater destiny for Holly?

A Christmas Tale will put you in the spirit of the season as you scour radiant Yuletide scenes for the objects Santa needs. And you won&#039;t get bored, either, as the gameplay has more twists than a Christmas bow! Can you pick out just the toys on a shelf crammed with merchandise? Or spot the differences between two nearly identical pictures? Download A Christmas Tale today and enjoy all-new scenes and mini-games!
# 36 levels
# 10 mini-games
# Thousands of hidden objects
# Unlimited game time
